name: Jay Leno
monologue: John McCain’s wife Cindy McCain and their daughter Meghan have posed for photos endorsing pro-gay marriage here in California. Sen. McCain is very traditional. He believes a marriage should be between an older man and a hot-looking younger woman.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: John Edwards has finally admitted that he is the father of Rielle Hunter’s baby. Given how long it took Edwards to admit, the kid is now old enough to not vote for him.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Edwards said that he looks forward to teaching his daughter everything he knows about hair care products.

name: Jay Leno
monologue: Back in 1982, Scott Brown posed naked for Cosmo. Normally, you get elected to the Senate and then get caught with your pants down.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: The late night wars are finally over. I’m kind of amazed I’m still here, too.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Jay Leno said he’s going to go on the Oprah Winfrey show and tell his side of the story. I never thought I’d say this, but watch your back, Oprah.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: Andy Dick was arrested again this weekend. All I have to say is, “Your move, Mel Gibson.”
